batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('wmimplant')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' change_user ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' gen_cli ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' command_exec ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' disable_wdigest ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' disable_winrm ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' enable_wdigest ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' enable_winrm ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' registry_mod ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' remote_posh ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' sched_job ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' service_mod ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' process_kill ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' active_users ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' basic_info ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' power_off ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' vacant_system ')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower(' logon_events '))))

metadata.objective: False positive: Administrative scripts that use the same keywords. Reference: https://github.com/FortyNorthSecurity/WMImplant
